survey_planet.name: Survey Planet in Orbit
survey_planet.description: Locate the Heavy Propulsion Surveillance Rod, retrieve its sample payload, and find clear weather for orbital extraction.

steps.name: Deploy to Planet
steps.hud_text: Travel to the planet surface to begin the survey mission.
steps.hud_hint: Speak to Mission Control to deploy

steps.name: Locate Surveillance Rod
steps.hud_text: Track the signal of the Heavy Propulsion Surveillance Rod.
steps.hud_hint: Use your scanner to locate the impact zone

steps.name: Retrieve Sample Payload
steps.hud_text: Extract the sample payload from the Surveillance Rod.
steps.hud_hint: Interact with the rod to retrieve the payload

steps.name: Find Clear Weather
steps.hud_text: Locate a zone with clear weather conditions for orbital uplink.
steps.hud_hint: Weather conditions change - find a clearing

steps.name: Establish Uplink
steps.hud_text: Deploy the orbital uplink device and wait for extraction beam.
steps.hud_hint: Defend the uplink while it establishes connection

rescue_operative.name: Rescue Operative
rescue_operative.description: Deploy as a Combat Medic. Heal and resurrect operatives from other squads to earn Medic Credits.

steps.name: Deploy as Medic
steps.hud_text: Deploy to the surface with your Combat Medic loadout.
steps.hud_hint: You've been granted medical abilities and equipment

steps.name: Assist Other Squads
steps.hud_text: Locate and assist wounded operatives from other squads.
steps.hud_hint: Healing your own squad doesn't count for credits

steps.name: Extract When Ready
steps.hud_text: Return to an extraction point when you're ready to leave.
steps.hud_hint: You can stay as long as you want to earn more credits

deep_extraction.name: Deep Extraction Mandate
deep_extraction.description: Descend into planet caverns via Heavy Bore Drill. Extract rare minerals and creature drops. High risk, high reward.

steps.name: Deploy to Planet
steps.hud_text: Travel to the planet surface to locate the Heavy Bore Drill.
steps.hud_hint: The drill creates access to underground caverns

steps.name: Locate Bore Drill
steps.hud_text: Find the Heavy Bore Drill site on the planet surface.
steps.hud_hint: Follow the smoke plume or use your scanner

steps.name: Descend Into Caverns
steps.hud_text: Use the drill elevator to descend into the cavern network.
steps.hud_hint: Deeper levels have better loot but more danger

steps.name: Gather Resources
steps.hud_text: Explore the caverns and collect valuable resources.
steps.hud_hint: Watch for hostile creatures - they hunt by sound

steps.name: Return to Drill
steps.hud_text: Return to the drill shaft before it closes!
steps.hud_hint: The drill closes 20 minutes after deployment
